import React from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' const PokemonCard = ({ pokemon }) => { const getTypeColor = (typeName) => { const colors = { normal: 'bg-gray-400', fire: 'bg-red-500', water: 'bg-blue-500', electric: 'bg-yellow-400', grass: 'bg-green-500', ice: 'bg-blue-300', fighting: 'bg-red-700', poison: 'bg-purple-500', ground: 'bg-yellow-600', flying: 'bg-indigo-400', psychic: 'bg-pink-500', bug: 'bg-green-400', rock: 'bg-yellow-800', ghost: 'bg-purple-700', dragon: 'bg-indigo-700', dark: 'bg-gray-800', steel: 'bg-gray-500', fairy: 'bg-pink-300' } return colors[typeName?.toLowerCase()] || 'bg-gray-400' } return (
{/* Pokemon Image */}
{pokemon.sprite_url ? ( ) : ( ? )}
#{pokemon.n_dex}

{pokemon.pokemon_name}

{pokemon.type_1_name} {pokemon.type_2_name && ( {pokemon.type_2_name} )}
HP: {pokemon.hp}
Atk: {pokemon.attack}
Def: {pokemon.defence}
Spd: {pokemon.speed}
{pokemon.is_legendary && (
Legendary
)}
{/* Decorative background */}
) } export default PokemonCard
